MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 18-NOV-2020 18:15.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the KY15 postcode area of Cupar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:15pm to safely complete repairs on our overhead line network located near Pathcondie Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:26pm on Wednesday, 18 November 2020
